name: ?Ball (B# Games)
description:
?Ball, pronounced "QBall," is a silly sports minigame with ever-changing rules created for Week 54 of the Weekly Game Jam. Best played in fullscreen.

Producer/programmer: Luke Piazza (https://pizzadelivery3.itch.io/)

Lead Programmer: Paris Geis (https://geisworks.itch.io/)

Lead Visual Artist: Joe Stella

Lead Sound Designer: Jake Hyland

Team page: https://bsharpgames.itch.io/
